Class RecyclerViewAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<RecyclerViewAdapter.ViewHolder>
      • ro.sapientia.ms.nagyizabella.sapiadvertiserizabellazsofia.adapters.RecyclerViewAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.widget.Filterable

    public class RecyclerViewAdapter
extends android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<RecyclerViewAdapter.ViewHolder>
implements android.widget.Filterable
    Created by Izabella on 2017-11-26. This adapter display the advertisement list in recycler view, when the user watching the advertisements

      class  RecyclerViewAdapter.ViewHolder
      Provide a reference to the views for each data item Complex data items may need more than one view per item, and you provide access to all the views for a data item in a view holder
